title: Spacious and Clean 2 Bed 1st Fl South Philly Apt w/ W/D, Yard & more!!
description:
Open, spacious and clean 2 bedroom 1st floor unit with full basement for storage, laundry and private back yard area. This unit was recently updated to have split system central Air and Heat units in every room, newer appliances and fresh paint throughout. Enter in to the open living room and kitchen area then following down the hall to the 1st bedroom with original bay windows. Further down the hall you'll find the large full 3 piece bathroom and finally finish in the primary bedroom with walk-in closet and door that takes you to the private back yard area. The whole unit has hardwood floors throughout, and an abundance of natural light in every room. Pets are case by case basis and with a non-refundable pet fee. First, last, and security deposit required at lease signing. 1 year lease minimum. Laundry in basement. Sorry no dishwasher. Cold water charged at flat rate of $40.00 per month. Tenants are responsible for Gas, electric, and Cable TV/internet. Applicant must first fill out an application with two recent pay stubs/some income verification, copy of photo ID, and non-refundable $75. For gross monthly income, we use 3x the rent. Tenant is subject to credit check, criminal and eviction check. Available now! For showings, please call/text Mike Giordano at  show contact info
!

title: Garage and parking lot available, Seasonal Bike Share Program
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:
Stay in a furnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 1109 on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face south and have a Chancellor Street view. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets, granite counters, and stainless steel appliances! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture! All utilities are included in the rent of this particular home.
This building has a convenient location! The grocery store, Rittenhouse Market, is two blocks away. Dine at wonderful restaurants such as Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Samuel's, Marathon on the Square, Pietro's, a.kitchen, El Merkury, Luna BYOB, Village Whiskey, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a cup of coffee at nearby cafes such as La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, and Bluestone Lane. Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, and Indochino are retail stores in the building. Other stores in the neighborhood include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Have a manicure or pedicure at Coco Blue Spruce. Relax in the park at Rittenhouse Square. Shop at the fabulous farmers market along the park every Saturday.

title: Renovated Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Grocery Stores
description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 2510 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view including a peak of South Philadelphia in between high-rise buildings. We plan to renovate this particular home. Be the first to enjoy new renovations! This renovated kitchen will be nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. This home will have wood floors. Move into your new home as early as February 15, 2023!
All utilities, except for cable and internet, are included. You have your choice of cable and/or internet provider.
Our amenities are amazing! This community offers a sauna, package room, lounge, fitness center, fitness/yoga studio, dog spa, guest suites, and bicycle storage. Lounge 201 includes a pool table, media room, printer/copier, conference room, demonstration kitchen, dining area, and cozy seating areas. Plus, we are renovating our roof deck! There is a front door attendant and a front desk concierge. In this building, there is a laundry room on every floor. Plus, you may do multiple loads of laundry at the same time in our large laundry facility on the third floor. We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by this community, so the monthly parking fee is separate.
Nearby grocery stores and food markets are Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Traders Joe's, Giant, Di Bruno Bros., and the Reading Terminal Market.
Wondering if this home is still available for rent at the Rittenhouse Claridge? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2510 is still listed under the Dali floor plan!
